name: Pinky Pumpernickel (Agatha, Wow)
description:
Pinky Pumpernickel (Agatha, Wow) is a spreadsheet walking sim, made for Excel.

Use arrow keys to navigate.

NOTE: It uses macros to control player movement, which you have to enable!

1. Right-click on the Excel file, and select "Properties"

2. At the bottom of the General tab, select the "Unblock" checkbox and select "OK."

For more info, see here: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/a-potentially-dangerous-macro-has-been...
